articles.title: US says Sudan factions agree to ceasefire as foreigners evacuated - Reuters
articles.description: The U.S. said on Monday that the warring factions in Sudan agreed to a 72-hour ceasefire while Western, Arab and Asian nations raced to extract their citizens from the country.
articles.content: KHARTOUM, April 24 (Reuters) - The U.S. said on Monday that the warring factions in Sudan agreed to a 72-hour ceasefire while Western, Arab and Asian nations raced to extract their citizens from the … [+1961 chars]
